    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      void copy​()
      Copies the content of the secretMessage TextArea to the system clipboard.
      void cut​()
      Cuts the content of the secretMessage TextArea to the system clipboard.
      void decodeImage​()
      Handles decoding the image by decoding the data using the appropriate class based on the extension (ImageSteganography or GifSteganography), then constructs an HiddenData object from the image header, then performs decoding and decompression (if enabled) to return the secret data.
      void delete​()
      Deletes the selected text of the secretMessage TextArea.
      void deselect​()
      Deselects the current secretMessage TextArea selection.
      void encodeDocumentInImage​()
      Encodes a document in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.
      void encodeImageInImage​()
      Encodes an image in another image using ImageInImageSteganography.
      void encodeMessageInImage​()
      Encodes a message in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.
      private static void getDocumentContent​(javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> documentView, java.io.File document)
      Reads a document line by line and sets its contents into a ListView.
      void getEncryptionPassword​()
      Gets the encryption mode from the password prompt.
      private byte getToggleGroupValue​(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup group)
      Returns the value of the encryption mode radio buttons.
      void paste​()
      Pastes the content of the system clipboard to the secretMessage TextArea.
      void quitApp​()
      Quits the app.
      void redo​()
      Redoes the last change to the secretMessage TextArea.
      void selectAll​()
      Selects all the content of the secretMessage TextArea.
      void setCoverImage​()
      Sets the cover image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the coverImageView then enables the disabled secret data controls.
      void setSecretDocument​()
      Sets the secret document from the JavaFX FileChooser then adds its content line by line in the secretDocumentContent using getDocumentContent(ListView, File)
      void setSecretImage​()
      Sets the secret image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the secretImageView.
      void setSteganographicImage​()
      Sets the steganographic image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the steganographicImageView.
      void setTheme​()
      Handles switching between themes for the main scene.
      void showAboutPage​()
      Displays the About Page.
      void showingEditMenu​()
      Handles the state of the menu items in the edit menu.
      void undo​()
      Undoes the last change to the secretMessage TextArea.

    • Method Detail

      • setCoverImage

        public void setCoverImage​()
        Sets the cover image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the coverImageView then enables the disabled secret data controls.

      • setSteganographicImage

        public void setSteganographicImage​()
        Sets the steganographic image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the steganographicImageView.

      • setSecretDocument

        public void setSecretDocument​()
        Sets the secret document from the JavaFX FileChooser then adds its content line by line in the secretDocumentContent using getDocumentContent(ListView, File)

      • setSecretImage

        public void setSecretImage​()
        Sets the secret image from the JavaFX FileChooser and adds it to the secretImageView.

      • encodeMessageInImage

        public void encodeMessageInImage​()
        Encodes a message in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.

      • encodeDocumentInImage

        public void encodeDocumentInImage​()
        Encodes a document in an image after compressing then encrypting it (if enabled), then calls either ImageSteganography or GifSteganography based on the cover image extension.

      • encodeImageInImage

        public void encodeImageInImage​()
        Encodes an image in another image using ImageInImageSteganography.

      • decodeImage

        public void decodeImage​()
        Handles decoding the image by decoding the data using the appropriate class based on the extension (ImageSteganography or GifSteganography), then constructs an HiddenData object from the image header, then performs decoding and decompression (if enabled) to return the secret data.

      • getEncryptionPassword

        public void getEncryptionPassword​()
        Gets the encryption mode from the password prompt.

      • getToggleGroupValue

        private byte getToggleGroupValue​(javafx.scene.control.ToggleGroup group)
        Returns the value of the encryption mode radio buttons.
        Parameters:
        group - radio button group.
        Returns:
        encryption mode (1 or 2).

      • getDocumentContent

        private static void getDocumentContent​(javafx.scene.control.ListView<java.lang.String> documentView,
                                       java.io.File document)
                                throws java.io.IOException
        Reads a document line by line and sets its contents into a ListView.
        Parameters:
        documentView - JavaFX ListView that will hold the document line by line
        document - document to display in the ListView
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - if an error occurs while reading the document
